name: id
description: The unique Spotify ID for the track.

name: album_id
description: Custom field: The ID of the album this track belongs to.

name: disc_number
description: The disc number (usually 1 unless the album has more than one disc).

name: track_number
description: The number of the track. If an album has several discs, the track number is the number on the specified disc.

name: explicit
description: Whether or not the track has explicit lyrics.

name: is_local
description: Whether or not the track is from a local file.

name: uri
description: The Spotify URI for the track.

name: href
description: A link to the Web API endpoint providing full details of the track.

name: preview_url
description: A link to a 30 second preview (MP3 format) of the track. Can be null.

name: available_markets
description: A list of the country codes in which the track is available.

name: external_urls
description: Known external URLs for this track.

name: artists
description: The artists who performed the track.
